trans-unit.source: Represents a data view on an XML node or collection of XML nodes for an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma exibição de dados em um nó XML ou uma coleção de nós XML de um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control can present its underlying data in both tabular and hierarchical format to Web server controls that bind to it.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> controle pode apresentar os dados subjacentes em formato tabular e hierárquico para controles de servidor Web que se associar a ele.

trans-unit.source: Controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> to bind to XML data and present it in list or tabular form, while controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, bind to XML data and present it in hierarchical form.
trans-unit.target: Controla como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> para associar a dados XML e apresentá-lo na lista ou formato de tabela, enquanto os controles que derivam de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> classe, como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, associar a dados XML e apresentá-los de forma hierárquica.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> creates each view type internally through different code paths.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> cria cada tipo de exibição internamente por meio de caminhos de código diferente.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A> method is called on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control, an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> object is created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A> método é chamado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> controle, uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> objeto é criado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> controle.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method is called, an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView> object is created.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> método é chamado, um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView> objeto é criado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> class is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> and bind to lists and tabular data, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView> is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> and bind to hierarchical data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> classe é fornecida para controles de servidor Web que derivam de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> e vincula a listas e dados tabulares, enquanto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView> é fornecido para controles de servidor Web que derivam de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> e associar a dados hierárquicos.

trans-unit.source: Internally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl> classes call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView.Select%2A> method of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> object view to retrieve data from a data source, while a class derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl> classes chamada a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView.Select%2A> método <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> objeto de exibição para recuperar dados de uma fonte de dados, enquanto uma classe derivada de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> chamadas a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Like all <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> helper objects, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView> defines the operations that the data source can perform with the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: Como todos os <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> objetos auxiliares de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView> define as operações que pode ser executadas a fonte de dados com os dados subjacentes.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView> class only overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> method, the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control does not support sort expressions or execute, delete, or update operations.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView> apenas substituições de classe a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> método, o associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> controle não oferece suporte expressões de classificação ou executar, excluir ou operações de atualização.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of the data items from the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista dos itens de dados da fonte de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable" /> collection of data items based on the hierarchical level of the current view.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable" /> de itens de dados com base no nível hierárquico da exibição atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable> that is returned by <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> and can be used like any <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable> que é retornado por <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> é um <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> e pode ser usado como qualquer <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> method to get an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> and iterate through the collection of <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> nodes, or use `foreach` (in C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> método para obter um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> e iterar através da coleção de <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> nós ou use `foreach` (em c#) ou `For Each` (Visual Basic).
